description.0: Version 12. A reprint featuring corrections to Version 11 and brand-new additions based on recent developments.

0.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>12%</cryo>.

1.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>15%</cryo>.

2.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>18%</cryo>.

3.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>21%</cryo>.

4.0: Increases DMG against opponents affected by Hydro or Electro by <cryo>24%</cryo>.
